column1: The course is designed to give you the tools to work towards a career in a wide variety of fields in the engineering and technical industries. The University’s Career Development Service is here to help you, throughout your academic journey. They can offer advice on interviews, CVs, work experience, volunteering etc. From the day you start through to graduation and beyond they will always be there.Some of the most pressing business challenges can be solved by smartly-designed software. By studying advanced software methods and techniques, you’ll be in high demand across most major industries.
FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
